DrifterMod:DexDownPower.NAME: Dex Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Dexterity at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:DexterityNextTurnPower.NAME: Dex Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b Dexterity next turn.

DrifterMod:DriftingPower.NAME: Drifting...
DESCRIPTIONS: Maintains your drift. If you don't have this, lose all your Drift at the end of the turn instead of half.

DrifterMod:DriftPower.NAME: Drift
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b Block and deal #b
damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of the turn, then lose half your Drift.
damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of the turn, then lose half your Drift.

DrifterMod:TempRetainPower.NAME: Retain
DESCRIPTIONS: Keep #b cards in your hand this turn only.

DrifterMod:ThornsDownPower.NAME: Thorns Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Thorns at the start of your turn.

DrifterMod:DriftStrengthDownPower.NAME: Drifting Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Strength if you lose your Drift.

DrifterMod:TempMaxHandSizeInc.NAME: Overdraw
DESCRIPTIONS: While your hand is not full, draw 1 card and lose 1 Overdraw until your hand is full. Overdraw: #b

DrifterMod:OverdrawNextTurn.NAME: Overdraw
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, draw 2. If your hand is full, draw when it empties.

DrifterMod:TractionPower.NAME: Extra Traction
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Drift, Drift #b extra.

DrifterMod:DriftNextTurnPower.NAME: Next Turn Drift
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, Drift #b

DrifterMod:ThermalPower.NAME: Thermal Engines
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn if you have Overdraw, gain #b

DrifterMod:AeroPower.NAME: Aerodynamic
DESCRIPTIONS: When you discard, draw #b cards (Up to amount discarded)

DrifterMod:BalancePower.NAME: Balanced
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play an even number of cards this turn, draw #b cards next turn.

DrifterMod:ZoomPower.NAME: Zoom Power
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card this turn, deal #b
damage to a random enemy.
damage to a random enemy.

DrifterMod:Speedup.NAME: Speed-up
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b
extra card at the start of your turn and gain these effects based on your Speedup:
extra card at the start of your turn and gain these effects based on your Speedup:
3+: Gain 1 Vulnerable.
5+: Lose 2 Dexterity this turn only.
7+: Lose 2 Traction this turn only.

DrifterMod:InControlPower.NAME: In Control
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
[E] for each card discarded this turn only.
[E] for each card discarded this turn only.

DrifterMod:CoolPower.NAME: In the Zone
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Block when you draw a card.
Block when you draw a card.

DrifterMod:FireTrailPower.NAME: Flame Trail Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b
damage to all enemies for each Overdraw.
damage to all enemies for each Overdraw.

DrifterMod:DriftSweepPower.NAME: Drift Sweep
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Drift hits all enemies.

DrifterMod:GambitPower.NAME: Final Gambit Power
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b
time you die while Vulnerable, heal to 5% HP.
times you die while Vulnerable, heal to 5% HP.

DrifterMod:ResolvePower.NAME: Resolve Power
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, gain #b
Strength, Dexterity and Traction.
Strength, Dexterity and Traction.

DrifterMod:TractionRestorePower.NAME: Traction Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Traction next turn.
Traction next turn.
